original_text: And those that were numbered of them, according to the number of all the males, from a month old and upward, were six thousand and two hundred.
korean_text: 그 계수된 자 곧 일 개월 이상 된 남자는 모두 육천이백 명이며

sentences.original_text: And those that were numbered of them
according to the number of all the males
from a month old and upward
were six thousand and two hundred
